short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free! Merge multiple PDFs into one PDF, which can be split into multiple pages, then re-selected sorted and merged into a new PDF
short.zh_CN: 免费将多个PDF合并成一个PDF；支持将多个PDF拆分成多页，重新选择、排序后再合并为新的PDF
short.zh_TW: 免費將多個PDF合併成一個PDF；支持將多個PDF折開成多頁，重新選擇、排序後再合併為新的PDF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Merge multiple two or morePDFfiles into one  for free. This plug-in will not upload files to the cloud, but only run locally on the computer.
Merge multiple PDFs into one PDF for free. It supports splitting multiple PDFs into a single page, reselecting, sorting, and merging into a new PDF.
PDF split will be launched in the next version.
long.zh_CN:
免费将多个PDF合并成一个PDF。支持将多个PDF拆分成单页面，重新选择、排序后再合并为新的PDF。
PDF拆分功能将在下个版本上线。
本插件不会保存上传文件，仅在电脑本地运行。
long.zh_TW:
免費將多個PDF合並成一個PDF。支持將多個PDF拆分成單頁面，重新選擇、排序後再合並為新的PDF。
本插件不會保存上傳文件，僅在電腦本地運行。
